title: When Guru's Talk Back: Catch up with Chris and Matt
description:
I have the pleasure of chatting with hosts of the Decoding the Gurus Podcast Matt and Chris for a second time. We go over what the past year has looked like as their podcast has taken off, and discuss which Gurus have come on to challenge some of their critiques. 

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/When-Gurus-Talk-Back-Catch-up-with-Chris-and-Matt-e1bj6cq

Listen to their podcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/ca/podcast/decoding-the-gurus/id1531266667
Find them on twitter @GurusPod

follow me on twitter @andrealynnlewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
follow my vintage Instagram @fringevintagefinds
